amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for victims of human sex trafficking by $17.3 million, bringing the funding level back up to a total of $43 million for victim services and victim grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Periodic Censuses and Programs by $17.3 million and increase funding for victims services programs for victims of trafficking by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
